price: 51. Haddaad arki lahaydna21 markay (gaalada) noqon kuwo qarracansan, oo meelay u cararaan lahayn, waxaana laga soo qabqaban meel dhow.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh faziʿū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarībin
